definitions: a plant of a diverse group of trees and shrubs of the ginseng family, native to America and Asia. Several kinds are cultivated for their foliage and profusion of tiny flowers, and some are used in herbal medicine.

notes.text: Genus Aralia, family Araliaceae: several species, including the bristly sarsaparilla (A. hispida)

shortDefinitions: plant of very diverse group of trees and shrubs native to America and Asia
